TextFlow.header: 使用表明相似点的语句

p.span: X is as good/strong/fast as Y.
Both boys and girls follow fashion and music.
Like their parents, teenagers today enjoy meeting their friends.

TextFlow.p: X is (mostly / very much) the same as Y.

p.span: Teenagers' exercise habits are mostly the same today as they were before the Internet.
Teenagers 30 years ago enjoyed meeting their friends after school and at weekends. Similarly, today's teenagers love spending time together.
School life today is quite similar to what our parents knew.

TextFlow.p: X and Y are similar in that they both...

p.span: Boys and girls are similar in that they both enjoy meeting their friends.
